title: Christmas Countdown Watch Face
summary: Can't wait 'til Christmas? Countdown with this fun Android Wear watch face!
description: This fun Christmas themed watch face displays the day, date and time along with a countdown of the days until Christmas! There are 4 different color backgrounds for your watch face from which to choose. Press and hold the watch face and tap the gear icon to choose your favorite face color.Get 25 Christmas Watch Faces with our 25 Days Christmas Watch Face! If you've tried and love this free version of the watch face, download our paid version to get more designs and support the developers who work hard to make fun watch faces! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shameronstudios.christmas.paid::Features::- Works on Round and Square watches- 12 or 24 hour modes- Countdown to December 24 or 25- A special "Merry Christmas" greeting on the 24th or 25th!To setup 24 hour mode or countdown to December 24th, simply use the configuration app on your phone to set your preferences. This app can be found within the Android Wear app by selecting the Christmas Countdown Watch Face app and then selecting the gear symbol on it.After installing this watch face, you may need to restart your phone and watch to make it display on your Android Wear watch. If you have further trouble, follow the syncing instructions on this page: http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/Permissions explanation:prevent device from sleeping - This is used to keep the ambient version of the watch face running
descriptionHTML:
This fun Christmas themed watch face displays the day, date and time along with a countdown of the days until Christmas! There are 4 different color backgrounds for your watch face from which to choose. Press and hold the watch face and tap the gear icon to choose your favorite face color.

Get 25 Christmas Watch Faces with our 25 Days Christmas Watch Face! If you've tried and love this free version of the watch face, download our paid version to get more designs and support the developers who work hard to make fun watch faces! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shameronstudios.christmas.paid

::Features::
- Works on Round and Square watches
- 12 or 24 hour modes
- Countdown to December 24 or 25
- A special "Merry Christmas" greeting on the 24th or 25th!

To setup 24 hour mode or countdown to December 24th, simply use the configuration app on your phone to set your preferences. This app can be found within the Android Wear app by selecting the Christmas Countdown Watch Face app and then selecting the gear symbol on it.

After installing this watch face, you may need to restart your phone and watch to make it display on your Android Wear watch. If you have further trouble, follow the syncing instructions on this page: http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/

Permissions explanation:
prevent device from sleeping - This is used to keep the ambient version of the watch face running
comments: Would love to use this - but says it's downloaded but it's no where to be found on phone or gear! Turned both items off and on and everything else I can think of. Got it 24 hours ago! Not there. Paid money
Looks great, wasn't expecting the color options but they add a lot to it.
I can't even get on the app
great until the season was over

If you've tried and love this free version of the watch face, download our paid version to get more designs and support the developers who work hard to make fun watch faces! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shameronstudios.christmas.paid
v3.0: Improves stability and how reactive the watch face is to configuration changes
